place_description: Popular gathering place for craft coffee drinks & tea with outdoor seating on the front lawn.

reviews_data.review_text: I LOVED this coffee shop! It was very busy but that's expected as the coffee and pastries are delicious! I got the iced caramel latte and the coconut crumbcake. Great choices, I'll surely be returning

Best coffee shop in Charlotte area

Come here daily. Coffee is good and the outdoor setting is what brings me back all the time

normally super yummy and our favorite spot to go when visiting clt. But today my Cold Brew, my gf's Coconut Vanilla latte, and my sisters Chai Latte were all so watery. Like immediately after getting them, so they weren't sitting or anything, the drinks all tasted like nothing and just straight water right after being handed to us. A bit sad cuz we love the vibes of the place but def hesitant to come back and wait in line for 20 min just to pay for watery drinks :/
It's one of my favorite non chain coffee shops.
Love the Latte....
I really liked the chocolate espresso shake and the blueberry muffin hit the spot! Cute cafe with kind service
Great bold flavored coffee!
Beautiful inside or out! Great, wonderful customer service! They offer a great variety of seasonal drinks as well!
the iced chai tasted like water might as well just stick to Starbucks the taste is so much better. The drinks just taste water downed and bland not good at all
Good coffee and reasonable prices
Good coffee with outdoor seating. The go-to place for your coffee needs. Wonderful people and peaceful atmosphere.
Very cute place, very reasonable prices, great atmosphere for those looking to do some work

Fun place & great customer service! We got the Ticket Please (one chocolate, one caramel) wished it was more espresso flavored, but it was good. Two shots of espresso seem muted with the ice cream base, but that makes sense. May add another shot next time! Chocolate chip cookie at the register was a hit with our youngest! Love the atmosphere & the outdoor seating is beautiful!
You have the best coffee I've ever tasted in the United States. Thank you!
Friendly atmosphere, great tea and coffee, nice gathering place in matthews
Great prices for coffee and nice atmosphere inside plus outside seating. We both got a caramel latte that was good.
Great coffee! They are doing a fantastic job of keeping Matthews slow.
Not every place have SF syrups, so thank you!

One of my new favorite coffee shops + cafes in Charlotte. The quality of their coffee seems to be richer and denser in flavor profile than other coffee spots (it ranks #2 for me with Provided Coffee being being the best I've tasted thus far from Charlotte area) - I will definitely be back!!!
I love this place,  beautiful place,  amazing and personable staff,  great pricing

Anytime I am in the vicinity of Brakeman's, no matter if I need it or not, it's coffee time. It's a quaint little home that they turned into a full-fledged business. The concept is locomotives, so the interior exposed brick, hard metal accent pieces, and even names of beverages all point in the same direction. The customer service is incredible and usually has the same faces, so getting to know the staff on a first name basis is very common. The bakery they contract with is a local non-profit and puts out amazing products. They also have other food related items for purchase for convenience. Where it all matters, because upscale coffee shops are white noise these days, the beans and roast are impeccable. I've tried a little bit of everything on their menu and the espresso is very high level. I highly recommend the Ticket to London. Pricing is on-point and reasonable considering the quality of product and location of business. What I really enjoyed, just as much as the rest of the aforementioned aspects, was the customer demographic. You get a variety of everyone in there, but yet it doesn't feel overcrowded, overhyped, or commercialized. It's just a good local spot with great coffee and top shelf staff. I highly recommend. Rating A
Such a cool coffee shop! It really feels like the living room of Matthews.

Love this little nook! The only thing is the seating is limited indoors, it gets crowded quickly. The coffee is a miss for me. But I love getting the queen bee and adding an extra shot for flavor! The music is hit or miss for me. But never distracting or obnoxious. The muffins are lovely and the gluten free baked goods are so tasty. The folks who serve are lovely. And the aesthetic of the shop is nice. I love the old photos in the bathrooms, all the natural light and the fountain outside in the back, the hardwood flooring. And the artwork, notebooks, pens, mugs etc are wonderful. Absolutely lovely spot to hang in the spring and fall! They really did a wonderful job with the space they have. Just wish the coffee game was bumped up a bit. ;) that would be the icing on the cake!

I usually get Iced Vanila Latte and Great Pumpkin Latte(seasonal menu) with Oatmilk. Today, I got the Iced Slow-Berry Matcha Latte with Oatmilk. WOW! It's fresh and tasty :)
The Berry flavor and Matcha tea taste go well together and the Berry flavor is not too strong, so it does not lose the Matcha tea taste.
And I highly recommend Great Pumpkin Latte for everyone who likes Pumpkin  :)
(February/2024)
You must try Dolche De Leche with oatmilk !!

Stopped in to grab a quick coffee. This place is so cute. I love going to local places anytime I'm in the area & this place gave me everything I love about doing it. The coffee was great, the staff was friendly, & the atmosphere was very quaint.
Amazing coffee here. Hands down this is the best coffee in the area.
Lavender latte was so good!

I love the story behind Brakeman's, to slow life down like the brakeman on the train. There is a shady patio out back, inside tables and out front seating to enjoy Downtown Matthews. They have a large drink selection and delicious treats. My favorites are the Ticket Please (Expresso milkshake) and the Matcha latte.
We ordered the seasonal eggnog coffee and it was amazing ! Love the small space... but be prepared to wait for 10-15mins as it's always crowded !

Lattes are very good and very cozy spot.
Great place to do work or hang out

Great environment, loved the coffee, awesome baked goods, and some healthy snack options! Their coconut milk has sugar in it, so I couldn't have any specialty drinks, but they have oat, almond, and coconut milk for those lactose intolerant. There are a lot of people working and studying, space can be hard to find when it's cold, but lots of options. Kids toys, outdoor seating, and attic, sunroom.. totally worth going. Everything you'd hope for from a cute coffee shop.
Great coffee spot! It's not my favorite coffee in NC but it really is a great spot. The coffee is good and love the matcha. Great atmosphere and nice spot to study or hang out with friends.
Perfect place to "work from home" for a little while.  Quiet, good playlist, cozy.  Great coffee too.
Nice place to meet family and friends for coffee, I liked the coffee cake muffin, my wife liked her Chai Latte.

Hip little coffee shop right in downtown Matthews Township. Latte was terrific, everything's expensive these days. But great atmosphere, indoor and outdoor seating, outdoor seating is dog friendly and the place has a great vibe.
Nice, local coffee shop. Enjoyed a latte and took some bottled cold brew and beans to go.
This perfect coffee shop is a staple for Matthews and surrounding towns. Guaranteed quality from espresso to service!

Came here for a drink and some fresh coffee beans. Excellent service and product. Very busy but had a small coffee shop vibe. Staff was very kind. I could tell there were a lot of regulars there, and I can see why. Will be back again.
Lovely place in a hold converted house!!
You haven't experienced Matthews until you've been to Brakeman's. Great coffee, inviting atmosphere, and awesome people.

Has great coffee and amazing that it includes a kids play area and kid snacks. This is something that's quite often overlooked. Joyful for us parent types. Good for a business meeting also or just relaxing
Really cool coffee shop in the heart of downtown Matthews. Great owners, great staff, great coffee, great atmosphere.
Cool place, people are friendly. Coffee tasted like it was from a gas station.
Very cute cafe with several different seating options. The coffee and pastry were average and the customer service was good.

What a cute coffee shop downtown Matthews.  It was very crowded today, but we found 2 seats to sit and drink our coffee.  Many people were hanging out, working on their computers and enjoying their coffee and goodies.  They have many outdoor seats to sit at on a beautiful warm day.

The coffee was really good and we'll definitely be coming back.
It has very good pastries and a cozy atmosphere.

This seemed to be a popular place - quite busy when I visited. There was a lot of seating available, scattered throughout, though as the temps get colder and outside becomes less appealing, it's bound to get more crowded. The coffee I had (decaf Americano) was pretty good, though a touch more bitter than I'd prefer. Overall a nice place.

Ahhhh .. : ) the back patio feels like a sanctuary. .I arrived impromptu to drink  a delicious iced lavender latte on the back patio in my " usual spot" ...the fall sun warmed my face, the "local "birds hung out around my feet ,, the soft sound of the fountain was calming , and a surprise visit from my beautiful daughter  who works nearby . PERFECT  ..
Coffee and service excellent. Atmosphere great.
Always great coffee and service!
Love this place for a tiny coffee shop there is still lots of seating inside and out!
Delicious coffee, friendly folks, wonderful location. It's great to have a charming local coffeehouse in historic downtown Matthews.
Yesssss! A place that actually has blueberry to add to my mochas! So far everything I've had here has been superb.  Love it!
Phenomenal coffee, great blueberry crumb cake. Competitively priced and lots of cool seating. Great spot.
Yummy coffee and great service!
Great coffee.
Lovely little coffee shop and pretty fast too! Great brews. I drink oat milk and they do a nice job frothing with great tasting oat milk.
Great little coffee shop with good drinks and tons of seating inside and outside

Yum! Pastries, coffee and GF ice cream.
Very cool vibe as well

The best thing about Matthews! They consistently make excellent coffee, and the pastry selection is good. I see a lot of people complaining about parking though- get over yourselves. First off , there is free public parking NOT even 250 yards from the building - you're just not looking hard enough. 2nd of all: Matthews has a small, dense downtown area so it can be hard to install parking (and you should be walking more anyway)
The muffins are nothing special, but the lattes are very smooth. Great atmosphere!
This place gives you the small town coffee vibes! It's cozy, clean and the best part my Iced Cafe Latte was amazing!
Very cozy and comfortable atmosphere, the almond latte was sweetened just enough, and there's so many options for seating and workspace.

Great location, atmosphere, and fast and friendly service. However, actual product quality leaves a lot to be desired. I've been to this place a handful of times to give it a fair shot since I want to love it so much. However, everything I've ordered has been watered down or bitter, barely drinkable.

Coffee was not worth drinking and no heavy cream or half&half.
The lady taking order was not pleasant and seemed annoyed.
The place is cute inside and out , I just wish the coffee at this coffee house was worth drinking.
Lovely little patio with cute birds. I had an iced matcha latte... Good flavor but I wish it had more matcha in it.
Great place to get coffee. Nice outside seating and some inside spots to get some work done.

Brakeman's Coffee & Supply in Matthews downtown. This is a must try if you come to Charlotte. Love the White House setting with the trees perfectly grown around to give the yards enough shades and lovely views to enjoy your coffee. More seats in the backyard and second floor, every corner is well decorated. I had the Cold brew and Iced Americano. It is a bit bitter for me but everyone else seems to like it, come try for yourself !! Excellent service.
Great small town social environment feel,good coffee, good service.
Great coffee! Nice atmosphere! This place has a good old fashioned coffee aroma, good vibes!

1st visit. Loved the people, location, atmosphere, choice and the price.

Outdoor space, boutique like serene environment was very positive and calming. They also welcome furry friends in their outdoor space is great

Will be one of our go to places, even though it little far to get to a coffee shoot/cafe
Plenty of small interior tables if you are looking to work or study. I like they have an outdoor seating as well and plenty of choices for coffee and pastries
Yum coffee. Little expensive
Awesome coffee and outdoor seating. Couldn't connect to the wifi outside, but I'm sitting pretty far away, so I'm thinking it's probably better service inside.
Wonderful little coffee shop! Loved the atmosphere and drinks were great too.
Love the muffins. Good service and amazing coffee.

The go to post farmer's market coffee spot!

Edit: I wish I could give them a 2nd 5 star review. I can't recommend this place enough!
A cafe with a good atmosphere:)
Great little coffee shop very busy Saturday morning. Good staff, just had coffee but they have a good selection of pastries
Good place to sit and drink coffee. Has a really nice atmosphere in downtown Matthews.
This is not just a coffee shop! This is an incredibly atmospheric place!
Staff was very friendly and my americano was delicious.
Cashier wasn't friendly so that always ruins things. The place itself = super cool concept & very accommodating

Great place, and much better coffee than Stolebucks. I had a small Americano that was perfect. Wife had a chai latte but said it was weak sauce although she would get it again. The atmosphere is eclectic and welcoming. Highly recommend

I had heard great things prior to visiting but the coffee was a miss. I came here on a busy Saturday, no bother waiting in line. Staff was great but overrun with orders. Made sure to tip 20%+ for that reason. I got a cold brew and it was overly watered down. Cinnamon coffee cake was good but nothing out of this world. Slightly disappointed altogether.

It's a good spot to hang or do your work/study. It's busy most of the times and may be hard to find a seat. When the weather's nice, it's good to sit outside (both front/back).

Everyone has different preferences with coffee. I think coffee here is around 3 out of 5. I usually get a 10 oz. hot latte and I feel that the ratio or how they make it taste a bit inconsistent. I visited about 10+ times with almost same drink and sometimes it's good, sometimes it's too milky and don't get enough of the fresh coffee flavor.
Delicious!!!
MY FAVORITE COFFEE SHOP AT HOME
Great meeting spot. Good coffee.
Very bitter, super loud, hot, and cramped inside ....
always so busy. the queen bee is my favorite-- tastes kinda like pancake batter if you're into that
We love Brakeman's! Great coffee, muffins and atmosphere! Staff is so friendly. It's one of our favorite places!
Only visit this coffee shop twice so far but it's always quick and friendly service. Their iced vanilla latte is delicious! The vibe is really relaxed and their bakery items look delicious.
The Candied Almond and Gingerbread seasonals are Amazing!

nice warm and cozy place, extremely friendly staff, and very relaxing ambience.
I waited 3 weeks to come here and it was well worth it, I will definitely miss this place when my holiday leave ends and I return to my duty station.
Very friendly staff always good drinks and food with a very calming and chill atmosphere
Nice little tiny spot to grab a cup of coffee with friends. Not too crowded, friendly staff
Nice hometown establishment, comforting vibes! Used to come here all the time in HS and upon revisiting have lots of nice memories here.
Great Cafe - enjoyed the coffee and breakfast sandwich. Nice staff - would come again!

This cafe is amazing, I loved how they made this place so different to others, my coffee was delicious, it was calm enough to make some calls and finish my work.
I really recommend this place.
Nice spot with great coffee. Perfect for meeting some friends or getting some work done! Plenty of plugs to keep your devices charged

I love the pastries that they offer, they taste homemade . I love the healthier option of strawberry smoothie with yogurt and of course the coffee  is yummy. I found that i like iced coffee too!! Great meeting place and beautiful outside courtyard garden in the back.

Great atmosphere and coffee/tea/other drinks at a decent price. Its only downside is that it tends to get so busy on Saturday mornings that the line stretches out the door and it takes forever to get to the front, but in order to attract so many customers they must be doing something right, so it's a good problem to have.

Ian, Scott, Tyler, and Wilson are the best workers there. Absolutely deserve a raise, they always make the best coffees, hand out the best looking pastries and knows how to help you out with what you want to order. They give out the best recommendations and my husband will never drink coffee from any other place but this one. Super nice and friendly people, from customers to friends :)
A beautiful little shop with lots of amenities! A great atmosphere! However, the coffee itself was very sweet and cheaply made. The bathroom was dirty and had a roach in it.
Love this old historical coffee shop! They do make delicious coffee,  especially the seasonal options are good! Loved the front  with big windows and the cutest romantic patio in the back
Enjoyed an iced latte here. Nice environment & atmosphere. Great area to sit outside.

I have been visiting Brakeman's for the better part of 4 years and it has been my favorite local coffee shop to meet with friends, do homework, and relax. It has even helped to influence the style of coffee shop I hope to one day open! I always recommend it to all of my friends and love their punch-card rewards system! Keep up the great work!
Great coffee selection and lots of indoor and outdoor seating.

Pretty average. Not sure how you mess up a chai latte, but they're consistently meh. Espresso drinks are highly dependent on the barista. Usually the ratio to milk is way off or the espresso is burnt. Popular because there's no other option in Matthews, not because the product is great.
Nice ambience.
Delicious iced latte and lovely outdoor patio!
Nice staff friendly atmosphere
The building is so quaint and the coffee is delicious.

I got my Decaf coffee beans from here,
I like it, fresh, and reach of flavor..
Highly recommend place to get your coffee beans in charlotte area
Just a great place to get coffee and get a nice bite to eat.

Excellent batch brew coffee (Colombian roasted by Haerfest).
Good espresso shot.
Friendly baristas.
Great coffee shop with character and unique nooks for seating inside.
Lots of outdoor seating options
Great local coffeehouse. Wonderful to space inside or outside to relax or work remote. Important to support local business!
About 8 parking spots in total and adjacent buildings will tow. If it wasn't such a hassle to find the entrance and then realize there's no parking I might have given this place a go.
Cool place, great menu. Friendly staff and yummy products
Differentiated menu and high quality coffee. Service is quick and cheerful
The seating inside is crowded, but it's set up nicely. The outside is beautiful and comfortable.  The coffee is great. Espresso is very good.
The best coffee in Matthews and the best service
Best coffee house in Matthews! Absolutely love this place it's a great place, got great muffins and other assortments, but has the best coffee in town.

Had a lovely time at this little cafe. Wonderful seating for reading or working on a laptop. The staff was exceptionally friendly and my order didn't take too long to come out. The coffee was also super delicious, and they have some pretty interesting pastry options.
Good coffee  & great service
great environment
Damn good cup of coffee .

Most unique and relaxing coffee shop in CLT area. Always slinging great lattes and cortados in a very warm and inviting atmosphere. Great staff. Locally roasted beans. Neat seasonal menu. Busy on Saturday's when the farmers market is open, but you can not beat a Saturday stroll in Matthews through the farmers market and Brakemans and then doing lunch in one of the great spots in walking distance. Slow down and enjoy the ride! #slowdown

We are new in town and had a great experience, we were having our coffee in their outdoor seating area and the owner (who was gardening around the cafe) came and said hi and asked us about our experience there. The coffee is great! The coffee is locally roasted, and you can tell that this is a business that loves the community and that the community loves it!
Excellent Americano and friendly service marked this visit to this quaint cafe.  The atmosphere is cozy and inviting and the vibe is peaceful!
Very delicious coffee! Ice vanilla latte, shadey seats on the patio, nice all around. On Saturday morning, line and ordering took 27 minutes. Popular place!
Liubliu eto mesto
Good coffee, and a few non caffeinated herbals in a cute house right in downtown Matthews. Love the back gardens for the privacy and the front garden for the town center feel.
Delicious coffee, and a fun, relaxing atmosphere.
Such a nice coffee shop in Matthews. It had it all. Great service, great coffee, nice outdoor seating, and great baked goods. I had the coffee cake. All in all a great experience. Recommend.
Great spot for work meetings and just to hangout
What a beautiful place to grab some dang good coffee. Inside and outside areas are wonderful places to sit back, relax, and imbibe.
Very friendly staff, great location, great coffee.
Honey bee latte with oat milk slaps every time. This is a genuinely enjoyable coffee stop.

Stopped by looking for a spot to read after visiting the library. This place is obviously a local favorite because the place was busy all morning I was there. They have a great spread of drinks to choose from and extend past the typical coffee shop offerings.

I ordered the Queen Bee latte which was the perfect pairing for reading outside on a warm day.

Also, they had a wonderful assortment of birds hanging around the front patio.
Pleasant.
Best place for coffee and conversation.  Matthews staple for a reason!
This is a gem of a coffee shop. Atmosphere is awesome. Chai is delicious. Smoothies are great. Happy to have found this place.
Love the Reuben. Really nice staff. Comfortable indoors.

Brakeman's is essentially the face of Mathews. I love this spot, the staff, the owners, and of course the coffee. They do a great job with their bean selection and make fantastic drinks from their drip to their seasonal menu. The charming old house gives the perfect coffee shop vibes. If you can find a spot to sit it's a comfortable place to work or hang out. The outside seating and back patio is beautiful. Muffins and snacks are the food options and all drinks are to-go style.
Cute place, friendly staff and decent coffee

Brakeman's is one of many jewels in downtown Matthews. I love the decor, drinks, and ample space (indoor, sun room, and out). Reasonable amount of parking on the street out front or in the lot behind them. Perfect place for a small work meeting or just to take a little break. It can get a bit crowded.
Easy food, sweet and coffee, All Times
My favorite local coffee place. There's a reason they're always packed on the weekends. This place is amazing! I love checking in every now and then to see their new seasonal flavors
Coffee tasted burnt. I threw it away after one sip. Really had high hopes.
Such a great coffee shop. Love the coffee hear and it's a great space to have a work meeting.
Super cute with delicious coffee

Have tried the coffee here a few times but always got it to go with me !
The coffee is really delicious , they have a lot of options took . The people that work here are very attentive and polite .
I love the ambience of this place and looking forward to stay and have some delicious coffee !
Brakeman's cozy atmosphere, friendly staff, good selection, and great coffee are what keep me coming back!
Fantastic Chai tea, customer service was outstanding. Great ambiance, friendly welcome. Thank you.
Best Americana I have ever had.
Delicious coffee!! Also such a cute cafe, I'd love to visit again but maybe when it's less crowded. The outdoor area is perfect for warm, sunny weather.
Love this place. One of my favourite places in Charlotte.

I saw a friend post about their seasonal Cookie Butter Chai and drove here to get one two days later. I actually had a gift card too so it was the perfect opportunity to use it.

They were super friendly and when we had 29 cents left after our gift card, they just said not to worry about it. Our drinks were ready quickly and were the perfect temperature to drink right away--very warm, but not burn your tongue hot.

There was a perfectly delicious hint of cookie butter and the chai was delicious. It wasn't the overly sweet stuff you find at a lot of places. You'll find a spicy, flavorful chai here.

I'll definitely stop by again sometime!
Good coffee

I called to place order for coffee beans, and mugs and gift cards. I found staff was rude, nonhelpful when I asked to speak to manager or owner was told to email if I wanted them. very poor customer service.

Amazing coffee. Amazing service. Amazing location. Amazing atmosphere.

-----
Update 01/2022:

Back patio has two propane heaters to help cut through cold days to enjoy a cuppa with a friend, while not having to be indoors. Thank you Brakeman's management and staff! Y'all rock! 

-----
Update 09/2021:

The Apple Chai-der is autumn in a cup! Amazing! The Rosemary Brown Sugar Latte (w/ oat milk) is amazing as well. Definitely a place to enjoy creative flavors... especially in the fall.
Tasty coffee, friendly staff, and a great atmosphere. Highly recommend!

Brakeman's consistently provides a great experience!! I work in EMS so I go all over Mecklenburg County, and this is one of my favorite coffee shops around. Today, while in my uniform, I ordered a latte. Ian Lawrence took my order and was so friendly and engaging. He even thanked me for my public service which made my day. The coffee shop was quite busy, but I only had to wait a few minutes for my drink. I received my latte, made by Scott, and it was delicious. He was friendly as well. The customer service here is outstanding, and the employees should be commended for doing a great job.
So good!!!
Great coffee, fun atmosphere, the entire store is well lit & they have plenty of seating! A must see for coffee snobs for sure!
The snickerdoodle latte was delightful!
Had a lavender latte and an almond poppyseed muffin. Everything was off-the-charts good. Good coffee and food, great atmosphere. I'd give it seven stars if I could.
Nice location.  Friendly service.  Great coffee and chai tea.  Like the outdoor seating.
Good place and coffee
Great coffee ever
Love Brakemans! My wife and I stop by frequently for a coffee and sometimes to read a book. Great coffee and awesome staff. Always makes for a great afternoon!

Great community vibe and genuine staff.
If you're in Matthews, this is the only place you should ever go for coffee!

Absolutely a great coffee shop because of the location. The coffee was good but it was a quaint location in downtown Matthew's. Indoor and Outdoor seating plus WIFI. Parking was limited, but the greenway has plenty of spots with the stair case leading directly up to the shop.
Was a really nice little place. The staff was super nice and helped with my decision here. Glad they had some vegan options for everyone to enjoy!
Delicious!!! Got my go-to drink, hot cafe mocha. Perfect!
Line is always long and so, the workers are overwhelmed and your drinks won't come as good. Got a chai tea latte here and it just straight up taste like whole milk.
LoFi Study beats, chill baristas, great location... and even better coffee. What else do you need?
My girlfriend got the hibiscus tea and absolutely loved it

I always choose to work at Brakeman's when I lose power or internet at home and I make frequent weekend stops because I'd rather support a small business instead of one of the big coffee chains. The atmosphere is great, the staff is awesome, and the prices are surprisingly decent. However, almost every coffee that I've ordered, hot or cold, has had almost no taste to it whatsoever. I do not put much dairy in my coffee to begin with, but I always ask them to go light because of this, and even then my drinks still barely taste like coffee. If they can figure out how to make some stronger coffee and/or fix the coffee-to-milk ratio, I'll gladly bump this up to 5 stars.
Love Brakemans! I am a student and I come here all the time to study. Great atmosphere and awesome coffee. Look no further for a local coffee shop!
Funky coffee spot, great service and excellent coffee drinks.

My favorite place to order a lavender latte...
If you haven't tried it I am sure you are missing a lot
Preaty good coffee a tad bitter for my taste but best in area
Awesome !
Great

This was such a cute little coffee shop! I got an iced oat milk lavender latte and sat outside enjoying the day. I definitely think the outside aesthetic of the house doesn't really match the inside, which was kind of a bummer, but the drinks were good and the atmosphere was enjoyable.
I love coming here on Mondays and the ladies that have served me (usually and hour before closing) have been nothing but nice and patient with me.
We're lucky to have such a great coffee shop nearby!
great friendly service!

Excellent coffee and staff is friendly even helping me to decide which yummy coffee drink to choose.  It is an adorable place and perfect for meeting a friend or like me reading a book  enjoying Brakeman's great atmosphere and subpurb coffee.  Peaceful. Highly recommend this place.  Come by and enjoy coffee, a pastry and good company.   Great place!
Coffee
Through and through my favorite coffee shop! The coffee and matcha is so good and the atmosphere and environment is the best! Highly recommend!!
Can be challenging to find seating but the folks who work there are great and the specialty drinks are hard to beat.
Very good prices and delicious smoothies! Definitely going back.
Super vibey coffee shop and my caramel latte was perfect! Would definitely spend a lot of time here!

Great atmosphere with lots of unique little seating areas both inside and out... Had an Americano with a splash of coconut milk and it was great...
Can't wait to come back and try more!
I was happy
Great coffee and lovely atmosphere in downtown Matthews.
Great coffee and a nice atmosphere. It's usually a busy shop so parking can be tough.
Fantastic coffee and great service in a lovely atmosphere
They have an outdoor space for those of us who are not quite ready to sit inside. The coffee and service are great. I love the season NillaBerry Latte!
Great coffee, nice patio
Great coffee, wonderful staff but they do not enforce the mask mandate which makes me a little uncomfortable.
Great place..Great customer service & fast. Lovely environment.
Lovely visit, excellent coffee, and a great ambiance.
Love the vibe of this place. You can sit inside or outside. I love coming to this coffee shop to read or write. Great for families. Only a short walk from the Farmer's Market on the weekends.
Fantastic coffee shop, great employees, wonderful experiences
This is a really great coffee shop.  Highly recommended
Great coffee!
Best coffee in Matthews.
Friendly service. Coffee was delicious....I'd go back and try another
Great patio for people watching. Coffee and food are good. It's on my rotation for remote work locations.
Coffee was good and the staff was very friendly.   Great little place for some life's blood.
My daughter's fav

Three stars because the atmosphere is wonderful, I truly enjoy my time there and the staff are kind. However, the coffee is consistently under par. I think it's a combination of the quality of the beans, using grounds that are not fresh, the beans being burnt resulting in a "burnt coffee" taste, and unexperienced baristas.
Cozy place, friendly service

Inviting, homey atmosphere with excellent coffee! Stopped briefly while checking out Real Estate in the area, as my family and I transition away from Oregonian culture. The menu was a smaller focused approach but they still offer appropriate choices for the anti-Starbucks crowd, such as myself.

Asked for a basic peppermint mocha, and received a drink, which has the perfect blend of subtle restrained sweetness... Just right

My favorite cooler shop in this area .
And the stuff is very nice !

Amazing bright scent -a- licios is what I called this place. this awesome coffee house in the middle of Matthews is the go to spot for your Java fix!!! Friendly customer service, awesome selection of pastries and beverages!! Plenty of outdoor seating and parking on the street. if you don't go here then I don't know what you doing with your life
Best cappuccino in Matthews downtown
Lots cofee
smoothie are good .great place they have there
Phenomenal coffee and sweets !

An absolute gem of a coffee shop. Great seasonal and speciality beverage selection, excellent customer service, and a wonderful laid back atmosphere with plenty of different seating options. Best coffee shop I've found in the Charlotte area so far!

What a fantastic new coffee shop. Needed badly in the little uptown strip in Matthews. The lavender coffee is amazing and my favorite. Not only is this little coffee shop a great local hangout spot but this coffee shop has become a meeting place for all sorts of events. Local city officials and politicians use this as a meet and greet place to discuss local issues and policy. Always worth a stop in when walking through uptown matthews.
Floyd & Blackies in Cramerton NC is much better.
Good coffee and a very good venue.  Enjoyed it!

Nice little seasonal latte selection. I had the almond and cardamom. Even though it was really busy, the baristas were patient, pleasant and efficient. Several comfortable seating areas were available, including a large and inviting outdoor patio. Local art adorns the walls. Next time I need caffeine while I'm in Matthews, I'll be sure to visit Brakeman's again.
Always consistent, always kind, always tasty! What more could you want when looking for a cup of joe? My pleasure to support such a fantastic local business!
Coffee was delicious. Staff was very friendly and the atmosphere was wonderful. Highly recommended!
Great local spot! Great latte and baked goods!
Great coffee with a great patio
Busy, but not slow service. Friendly people. Great coffee and pastries!
Great coffee  and espresso  drinks.  Excellent and fast service.
Great americano and choc chip muffin
Awesome place to catch up with friends
Enjoy going they have the best coffee and the staff is so friendly and nice

This place is what a coffee shop should be.  Lot of seating in different spaces, Outdoor seating, unique menu, and friendly staff.  Most importantly, everyone was wearing a mask and it was very clean.

I come to this coffee shop anytime I am in Matthews.  It is my favorite in Charlotte!

I come here every morning before work, they have helped me create a pleasant morning routine after dropping my son off at school. The barista (baristo, perhaps?) Scott is often the one who makes my drinks, and he is friendly and engaging when you come to pick up your order. I highly recommend this coffee shop to those who are looking to study, meet up with friends, or would just like a quick treat.

LOVED the place! I had the Brakeman's House coffee... I've recently gone to drinking my coffee black and THIS blend was FANTASTIC! The indoor seating was quaint but we chose the outdoor area for the view and the gorgeous weather! Highly recommend!
Love, love, loved it there! Perfectly placed in downtown Matthews. Thank you for the yummy tea!
Lavender Latte was on point

Absolutely a great place to sit down and relax while drinking a coffee. I had a mocha and a muffin but i bet that the other stuff on the menu are fabulous too. I definitely recommend coming here if your and vacation, want a quick drink, or to relax and study. If i could give this place 10 stars i would. The baristas are really nice and helpful and know how to communicate properly. Their merch is also really cool to so if you want a gift for someone that likes coffee you found one. The place is really nice too and very well organized.

Not the greatest experience first time going. Ordered two drip coffees, had to wait 20 minutes. Gave me a large Latte instead of a small drip. Latte was disgusting, had a burnt almond taste. Drip coffee was average.

Nice atmosphere inside, lots of outdoor seating.

I would try going again when it's not so busy.
Good coffee
Great place to get a cup of coffee and do some work. Try the Lavender Latte!
Delightful atmosphere and fantastic coffee! Try the caramel oat milk latte!

Really cool coffee shop in Matthews. Matthews has never had a coffee shop like this so it's great to have them here. Coffee and drinks are great here. Staff is nice and their shop is very clean and has a lot of seating options inside and outside. They sell merchandise as well along with coffee to take home to brew yourself which is cool. Definitely recommend Brakeman.
